decisions.reasoning: The transition area might be too small or the background positioning might be off. Let me check - the issue could be that `background-size: 100vw auto` with `background-position: 38% calc(100vh - 60px)` might not show the right part of the image, or the image might not be visible at all in a 90px tall div.

decisions.reasoning: The mask might not be working. Let me think about why. The mask is applied to the inner `.dissolve` div which is 100vh tall, but the mask's y percentages (6%, 24%, 42%, etc.) are relative to that 100vh height. So the circles are scattered across the full viewport height, but only the bottom 120px is visible through the wrapper. That means none of the mask circles (which are at y=6% to 78% of 100vh, i.e., at ~60px to ~780px from the top) are in the visible portion (the bottom 120px).
